scripts.build:ui: cd ../chorus-ui && gren make Main --output=build/app.js && cp build/app.js static/index.html static/styles.css ../chorus/static/
scripts.test:unit: cd tests/unit && gren make TestRunner --output=../../build/unit-tests.js && cd ../.. && cp build/unit-tests.js build/run-unit-tests.js && echo 'this.Gren.TestRunner.init({});' >> build/run-unit-tests.js && node build/run-unit-tests.js
scripts.test:integration: cd tests/integration && gren make IntegrationRunner --output=../../build/integration-tests.js && cd ../.. && cp build/integration-tests.js build/run-integration-tests.js && echo 'this.Gren.IntegrationRunner.init({});' >> build/run-integration-tests.js && node build/run-integration-tests.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
